#summary Howtos, examples and docs for RAFT analyzer development.

= RAFT Analyzer Development =

Developing a new analyzer for RAFT is easy!  You will need to be able to read and understand Python at a basic level.  Try this [http://docs.python.org/tutorial/ Python tutorial] if you need to brush up on your Python fundamentals.

If all you need is some quick and dirty analysis, AnalyzerBasics should be enough for you to get started.


  * [AnalyzerBasics]: Developing your first analyzer from the template
  * [AdvancedAnalyzers]: Using more advanced analysis features
  * [CustomResults]: Overriding the default reporting to generate custom results
